documentation.title: Array Declaration Spacing
documentation.standard: When an array uses associative keys, each pair of key and value must start on a new line.

code.title: Valid: There is only one pair of key and value per line.
Invalid: More than one pair of key and value per line.

documentation.standard: Each item in a multi-line array must be on a new line.

code.title: Valid: Only one array item per line.
Invalid: Multiple array items in the same line.
